text: I think most people can get away with
doing like 25 to 30% less than Race
distance on their long run and just
extend up to it on race day but I want
to make of one Clear Point right from
the start here is that is this is not
how to survive your first marathon this
is not how to complete your first
marathon this is how to run your best
Marathon because the training is night
and day between those two in my opinion
whether you're looking to complete or
I'm glad you made that differentiator
because yeah we're looking like we're
going out there to run our absolute best
